catalog.description: Supervised experience for nonbusiness students either in service or business-related work.
catalog.note: An APPROVED Internship Application is required before adding. Students must contact the Internship Office immediately after registering to learn about class requirements (460 TNRB, 801-422-4573, msm_internship@byu.edu).
catalog.recommended: Visit Marriott School of Business Advisement Center.
catalog.title: Academic Internship.

course_headers.header_text: MSB 199R: Approval required to add course. See msm.byu.edu/internships or meet with an Internship Advisor in 460 TNRB to learn about the application process and course requirements. Contact: 801-422-4573 or msm_internship@byu.edu.
MSB 199R: An APPROVED Academic Internship Application is required before adding.
